Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to prohibiting civilian drone use within 1000 ft of a correctional facility
Summary: Relates to prohibiting civilian drone use within 1000 feet of a correctional facility except when in use under the Federal Aviation Administration's authorization.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to civilian drone use near a correctional facility
